pages.text:
Membership Information
For all membership inquiries, please contact our membership director, Mike Walker at
mwalker@panamacountryclub.com
.
Class A Membership
Class A Members enjoy full use of golf course, driving range, practice and putting facilities. Members also enjoy access to dining and social events, as well as use of the swimming pool and fitness center. Class A members receive discounts on food and beverage, merchandise in the pro shop, and room rental fees. Class A members have the privilege to use their own cart on the golf course for an additional fee. Class A members have the ability to invite 1 guest per month for a complimentary rate. Additional guests of Class A members can play for a discounted rate. Membership privileges extend to the Class A member’s dependents as well.
Class A members must purchase a share of stock. This entitles the Class A member to vote at the annual election and hold office after being a Class A member for 2 years.
Associate Membership
Associate Members enjoy full use of golf course, driving range, practice and putting facilities. Members also enjoy access to all dining and social events, as well as use of the fitness center and the swimming pool. Membership privileges extend to the Associate member’s dependents as well.
Young Adult Membership
Membership includes full use of golf course, driving range, practice and putting facilities. Members also enjoy access to all dining and social events, as well as use of the fitness center and the swimming pool. Members must be between the ages of 18 – 35 years old. Membership privileges extend to the Young Adult member’s dependents as well.
Social Membership
Social Members enjoy access to the swimming pool, fitness center, and clubhouse. This membership also includes all events and activities at Panama Country Club. Membership privileges extend to the Social member’s dependents.

Pro Shop

proshop@panamacountryclub.com

Lynn Haven, Florida 32444

Directions
From the roundabout, enter Country Club Harbour through
the main entrance.
Once through the gate, proceed to the stop sign.
At the stop sign, take a left.
Proceed down Country Club Drive to the next stop sign.
Slight left to turn into Panama Country Club parking lot.
The clubhouse entrance will be through the main doors.

Events
Package Information
For all event inquiries, please contact our events coordinator at
cjones@panamacountryclub.com
Our clubhouse offers a beautiful view of North Bay in Lynn Haven, FL
visible from our wraparound patio,
lawns and our floor to ceiling windows covering the entire back
of our clubhouse.
We are secluded within the quiet neighborhood of Country Club Harbor Estates in Lynn Haven, FL, just north of Panama City. Our clients love our venue for our incredible live oaks and stunning sunsets overlooking the Bailey Bridge.
We offer private, full service banquet catering and a full bar for weddings and special events.
We strive to create a magical experience here where you and your guests can relax and feel like everything is handled for you.
You do not have to be a member to access our venue for your event.
Events begin at $600+ and Weddings begin at $4000+.
To schedule a tour, please contact our events manager at
cjones@panamacountryclub.com
or 850-265-3055 ext. 3
